title: CDC: (shrugs), Reality Romance Reigns  7.27.20
itunes:title: CDC: (shrugs), Reality Romance Reigns  7.27.20
description:
In episode 680, Jack and Miles are joined by comedian and Who's Your God? podcast co-host Amy Miller to discuss Dr. Fauci's family needing security, new CDC guidelines for opening up schools, what could happen if Trump refuses to step down, Palm Springs, Indian Matchmaking, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. Did Dr. Fauci Create Covid-19?
  2. Fauci Says He And His Family Have Been Assigned Security Detail Due To ‘Serious Threats’
  3. Fauci: 'I certainly don't think we're near the end of this'
  4. New CDC guidelines come down hard in favor of opening schools
  5. Majority of teachers say they are worried about coronavirus exposure on the job: poll
  6. Trump's assault on election integrity forces question: What would happen if he refused to accept a loss?
  7. WATCH: Made Me - Sango, Waldo

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
